name: developmentcats/osrs-kasm
description: Launch Old School RuneScape directly through your browser using Bolt Launcher. App-like experience with automatic authentication, smart fullscreen detection, and support for RuneLite, OSRS, HDOS, and other clients.
notes: OSRS app experience using Bolt Launcher with smart window management that auto-fullscreens game clients. Supports RuneLite, OSRS, HDOS, and other clients. Mount /home/kasm-user/.runelite, /home/kasm-user/.jagex, and /home/kasm-user/.var/app/com.adamcake.Bolt for persistent settings.
